name: Big Problems Need Tiny Solutions
description:
An agent has been framed for murder and put away in a small world. 

He has to solve the puzzles and escape to get back his life. You will see how relative size can be!

Controls: 

It starts with continuous movement and later switches to teleportation .

Left hand-Move forward, back, left, and right.  Teleportation ray (Primary 2D axis)

Right hand- To snap rotate 45deg. Teleportation ray (Primary 2D axis)

Open for feedback.

Known issue: Teleportation as a small person might be tricky because of an unknown offset, which will be fixed in the future update. 

Credits: Khaled Reguieg, Immersive Insiders and Digital Animals

Disclaimer: Android build is not tested. Originally developed for HTC Vive.
